reviewText:
10 drivers from all over the US and Canada, Occupying the cockpits of a most incredible cropm of four-wheel-drive masterpieces, tackles obstacles and challenges specially built to stop them.

Contestants and their vehicles check in at Four Wheeler's RTI ramp to measure articulation; trucks are judged for engineering and quality of presentation; judges go for a ride-and-drive, and they measure acceleration and braking. Then contestants and their vehicles tackle the Frame Twister, the Mud Pit, the Mini-Rubicon, and the Hill Climb.

60 minutes
